title: Car Model - Detail Page - Basic
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to have a dedicated page for each CAR MODEL\
So every information about it can be found in one place
description:
# **Request**

* method: `GET`
* URL path: `/car-models/<id>` 

# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* an HTML page, displaying the specified car model node

**Unhappy path**

* negative HTTP status code when the car model does not exist (404)

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* the page displays
  * the name of the car model as a headline h1
  * the name of the car model within the page title (might incl. other information like the node type or the more cars title)
  * a fact sheet section with all properties listed up
    * empty properties are marked as such
* an appropriate message is shown when there exists no car model with the given ID

**Quality Gates**

* Behavior tests (Playwright) are extended
* Accessibility tests are extended
* Performance tests are extended
* Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* logo
* main navigation
* summary text
* relationships (incl. images)
